Name: Naming of the David Dinkins - Washington Bridge.
Title: A Local Law in relation to the naming of the David Dinkins - Washington Bridge.
Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:

	Section 1. The following bridge located in the Boroughs of Manhattan and the Bronx is hereby designated as hereafter indicated.  

New Name
 Present Name 
David Dinkins - Washington Bridge
 Washington Bridge 

      �2. The official map of the city of New York shall be amended in accordance with 

the provisions of section one of this local law.
      
      �3. This local law shall take effect immediately.
      
      
      
      
      
      
      
      
      
PM
LS# 493
1/27/14
